description: Delete one or more files. In PowerShell, this command is an alias of Remove-Item. This documentation is based on the Command Prompt (cmd) version of del. More information: https://learn.microsoft.com/windows-server/administration/windows-commands/del.

useCases.description: View the documentation of the equivalent PowerShell command:
Delete one or more files or patterns:
Prompt for confirmation before deleting each file:
Force the deletion of read-only files:
Recursively delete file(s) from all subdirectories:
Do not prompt when deleting files based on a global wildcard:
Display the help and list available attributes:
Delete files based on specified attributes:
